Projects

There’s quite a few of us keeping the collective operational. We’re always working on something new whether it’s within the organization or outside. Here you’ll find a brief showcase of the projects we’re currently creating.

  • Sam’s Roadtrip to Seattle – Leaflet map with photos of key points during Sam’s move out West
  • Web Basemaps – looking at different mapping APIs and establishing a basemap
  • Mapsam Experiments – some other web-related experiments
  • Where Are We From? [Interactive Map] (outdated)

Collective spatial learning from students and professionals
